In England, in the seven days to 17 February, there were 70,422 new confirmed cases (125.1 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 10 February, there were 89,157 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 21% (18,735 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 22 February is 3,614,793 (6,422.1 cases per 100,000 population).
